translations: v．呕吐（vomit的过去式和过去分词）：从胃中迅速排出食物和胃液。
· He vomited after eating spoiled food.
他吃了变质的食物后呕吐了。

sentences.sentence: He had vomited up his supper.
sentences.translation: 他把晚饭吃的东西都吐了出来。

sentences.sentence: They vomited a couple of times.
He vomited all the food he had eaten.
sentences.translation: 他把他吃的食物全都呕吐出来了。
